Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: The course is fundamentally about building strong and ethical institutions (corporations) by focusing on "企業倫理" (business ethics), "倫理決策" (ethical decision-making), and analyzing "金融弊案" (financial scandals).

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course explicitly includes "永續發展目標 (SDGs)" in its curriculum, directly teaching the global framework that underpins partnerships for sustainable development.
